description: A composite of two images to scale taken minutes apart. Non-astronomical note: In parallel I took further photos and a short video before the two girls or guys felt asleep hanging on the power line. Bats have a cute face almost like a fuzzy little teddy bear. The left one pissed before s(he) slept. For this to do it turned up 180 degrees, completed its business and returned to sleeping position with a face as if nothing happened. Unfortunately, I failed to video the scene. It was truly funny. Wait... the power line crosses my vegetable garden. Dear viewers in the southern hemisphere, please feel free to rotate the image 180°. July 10th., Revision B: If anybody is interested in the night life of bats, here is a 1-minute MP4 video (24MB): View
title: Bats Sleeping at Moonrise
